Geramnya Jokowi pada Tender di Akhir Kalender
07 Nov 2019, 06:28 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) geram mengetahui masih ada proses tender di November jelang penghujung tahun. Jokowi heran karena tender akhir tahun membuat pekerjaan proyek konstruksi terburu-buru.
Informasi tender di akhir tahun ini diketahui Jokowi dari Kepala Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Pemerintah (LKPP) Roni Dwi Susanto. Jokowi menyebut ada tender konstruksi di akhir tahun yang nilainya Rp 31,7 triliun.
"Apakah mau kita ulang-ulang kayak gitu? Ini tinggal November, Desember masih e-tendering," kata Jokowi saat membuka Rakornas LKPP di JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
"Meski tahu ada yang cepat, tapi apakah seperti ini mau kita teruskan? Rp 31 triliun, e-tendering bener bisa cepat. Tapi ini urusan konstruksi. Mau manggil siapa kontraktornya? siapa coba maju sini saya beri sepeda," imbuh Jokowi.
Jokowi meminta agar tidak ada lagi tender di rentang waktu mepet. Pengerjaan konstruksi yang asal kebut ditegaskan Jokowi berpengaruh buruk pada kualitas infrastruktur yang dibangun
"Lepas Agustus masih urusan lelang, gimana? Tapi kenyataannya masih banyak dan ini kita ulang terus kesalahan seperti ini. Akhirnya apa? Ya kualitasnya jelek. Jembatan ambruk, ya kayak gini, November masih lelang, SD ambruk, karena kerja cepat-cepatan dan pas kerja pas basah, hujan," ujar Jokowi dengan nada meninggi.
"Nggak mungkin pekerjanya masih payung. Sudah bohong kayak gitu. Kesimpulan jelas jangan seperti ini," tegas dia.

Jokowi's indignation at the Tender at the End of the Calendar
Nov 7 2019, 06:28 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) is furious knowing there is still a tender process in November near the end of the year. Jokowi was surprised because the year-end tender made construction work in a hurry.
Information on the tender at the end of this year was known by Jokowi from the Head of the Government Goods / Services Procurement Policy Agency (LKPP) Roni Dwi Susanto. Jokowi said there was a construction tender at the end of the year with a value of Rp 31.7 trillion.
"Do we want to repeat like that? This is only November, December is still e-tendering," Jokowi said when opening the National Coordination Meeting of LKPP at JCC Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
"Even though we know something is fast, but do we want to continue like this? Rp 31 trillion, e-tendering can be really fast. But this is construction. Want to call the contractor? Whoever tries to advance here I will give a bicycle," Jokowi added.
Jokowi requested that there be no more tenders in the tight time span. Jokowi's stressed construction work has proven to have a negative effect on the quality of the infrastructure built
"After August, it is still a matter of auction, how about it? But the reality is that there are still many and we keep repeating this kind of error. Finally what? Yes, the quality is bad. work when it's wet, it's raining, "Jokowi said in a rising tone.
"There's no way workers are still umbrellas. It's a lie like that. Conclusions clearly don't be like this," he stressed.
